text: The flag of León () It is colored green and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 2:3. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Green #009c3b Yellow #F1BF00 ==Related pages== * Flags of municipalities of Mexico * León, Guanajuato * Flag of Guanajuato ==References== Leon Leon Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of León, Guanajuato
